icap.core
Class AbstractService

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      icap.core.IcapParser
          icap.core.AbstractService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Icap, java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContextCompress, EchoService, GreasySpoon, PreviewService
public abstract class AbstractService
extends IcapParser

Abstract class silently providing all ICAP protocol parsing methods for both REQ and RESPMODE
Services implementation must just provide getResponse() and getOptions() methods

TODO: optimizations: add lazy parsing. Move methods to static.
TODO: move configuration from static flat files to class method
TODO: implement new DataInputStream class, with undeprecated readline() method

Author:
mittig

readChunk

public int readChunk(int chunksize,
                     boolean previewreading)
Read an iCAP chunk of given size. Chunk data is append to reqbody or resbody depending of the calling mode

Parameters:
chunksize - The chunk size to read
previewreading - Set if chunk reading is made during preview or not
Returns:
the size of next available chunk
